modName: USLEEP Patch for Realistc Needs and Diseases
summary: Changed master from the old USKP to the new combined USLEEP patch
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=5]USLEEP Patch for Realistc Needs and Diseases[/size][/u][/b]
Original mod by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5432630]perseid9[/url][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/142441-theycallmecheese/]

[/url][size=4][b][u]Description:[/u][/b][/size]

[size=3]Since perseid9 has decided to quit modding Skyrim (Thanks for all your work!), there will be no more patches for his mods. Since the Unofficial Skyrim Patch has no been combined into the new USLEEP the USKP patch from RND will no longer work. This mod changes the master in the patch from USKP to USLEEP. Simple as that! So if you are not comfortable messing around with TES5Edit yourself now you can just download this instead of the patch from the RND page.

[/size][size=4][b][u]Installation:[/u][/b][/size]

[size=3]Extract the contents of the RAR file to your "skyrim/data" folder, or use the Nexus Mod Manager/Mod Organizer (Recommended for easy install/uninstall).[/size][size=3][size=3]
[size=3]
[size=4][b][u][size=3]Credits:[/size][/u][/b][/size]

[size=3]All credit for the mod goes to the original author, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5432630]perseid9[/url][/size][/size]. I have just made the changes to his USKP patch to make it easier for other users.

[b][u]Original mod:[/u][/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/?

If you enjoy his mod, please head over to his original mod page and hit the endorse button so he gets the reckognition he deserves, even if he has quit modding Skyrim. Thank you :)
[/size][/size][/center]
author: Kryseth and perseid9
